sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个形容词均有"每天的，日常的"之意。
means: daily ： 普通用词，特指每天发生一次的，也可指按日计的。
everyday ： 一般日常用词，指日常发生的、无须特别关心的。

sentence.Network_en: Daily facial exercises help her to retain the skin's elasticity.
sentence.Network_cn: 每天做面部运动帮助她保持皮肤弹性。

sentence.Network_en: Be sure you get your daily quota of calcium.
sentence.Network_cn: 要确保每天的钙摄入量。

sentence.Network_en: The Daily Mail has the headline "The Voice of Conscience"
sentence.Network_cn: 《每日邮报》的头版标题为“良知的声音”。

jx.jx_en_mean: the activities and experiences that constitute a person's normal existence

entry.def: If something happens daily, it happens every day.

example.ex: Cathay Pacific flies daily non-stop to Hong Kong from Heathrow...
example.tran: 国泰航空公司每天都有从希思罗机场直飞香港的航班。

example.ex: The Visitor Centre is open daily 8.30 a.m. – 4.30 p.m.
example.tran: 游客中心每日上午 8:30 至下午 4:30 开放。

entry.def: Daily quantities or rates relate to a period of one day.

example.ex: ...a diet containing adequate daily amounts of fresh fruit...
example.tran: 包含了足量一天所需新鲜水果的饮食

example.ex: Our average daily turnover is about £300.
example.tran: 我们的平均日营业额约为 300 英镑。

entry.def: A daily is a newspaper that is published every day of the week except Sunday.

example.ex: Copies of the local daily had been scattered on a table.
example.tran: 几份当地的日报散放在桌子上。

entry.def: Your daily life is the things that you do every day as part of your normal life.

example.ex: ...the failure of the government to improve most people's daily lives.
example.tran: 政府没能改善大多数人的日常生活

means.word_mean: 1. a newspaper that is published every day

sentences.sentence: "day-by-day labors of thousands of men and women"- H.S.Truman

means.word_mean: 2. measured by the day or happening every day;

stems_affixes.word_buile: day日,日子+ly表副词或形容词等→daily每日的[地]→日报

stems_affixes.value_cn: 每天的, 日常的, 平常的, 平凡的
stems_affixes.word_buile: every每一的+day日,日子→每天的→日常的→平常的→平凡的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 每日, 日常地, 天天
stems_affixes.word_buile: day日,日子+ly表副词或形容词等→daily每日的[地]→日报
now现在+a+days=day的复数→adv.现今, 现在
day日,日子+ly表副词或形容词等→daily每日的[地]→日报

stems_affixes.value_cn: 天, 白天, 日子, 白昼, 黎明
stems_affixes.word_buile: day日,日子→n.天, 白天, 日子, 白昼, 黎明
day日,日子+break破晓→n.黎明, 拂晓

stems_affixes.value_cn: 日光, 白昼, 白天
stems_affixes.word_buile: day日,日子+light光→n.日光, 白昼, 白天
day日,日子+time时间→n.白天, 日间

Sentence.sentence: At the age of six she started reading the daily financial newspapers and opened her own bank account.

A study by researchers at the University of California, San Francisco (UCSF), Stanford University and Columbia University shows that even a modest decrease in daily salt intake (摄入) can lead to dramatic health benefits.
Singaporean head chef Tommy Teh Kum Chai offers daily specials on a blackboard, rather than sticking to a menu.
Bonds are bought and sold daily on major securities exchanges.
They allow young people to exchange moment-by-moment experiences in their daily lives with special partners and thus to have a more continuous sense of connection with friends

sentences.en: He does daily exercises to help control his weight.
sentences.cn: 他为控制体重而每天坚持锻炼。

sentences.en: These subjects reflect their daily lives.
sentences.cn: 这些题材反映了他们的日常生活。

sentences.en: They also supply other daily necessities to the city population.
sentences.cn: 他们也向城市居民提供其他日常必需品。

jushi.english: He does daily exercises to help control his weight.
jushi.chinese: 他为控制体重而每天坚持锻炼。

jushi.english: They also supply other daily necessities to the city population.
jushi.chinese: 他们也向城市居民提供其他日常必需品。
